ctx: intros p q r s H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: The reference r was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros p q r s H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a1, a2 : Term A n l1, l2, l3 : list (Term A n) H2 : plusP l1 l2 l3 H : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 H0 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) Unable to unify "eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3".

ctx: intros p q r s H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a1, a2 : Term A n l1, l2, l3 : list (Term A n) H2 : plusP l1 l2 l3 H : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 H0 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) Unable to unify "plusP l1 l2 l3" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3".

original: intros p q r s H1 H2. induction H1; destruct H2. - reflexivity. - inversion H; subst. inversion H2. - inversion H0; subst. inversion H1. - apply plusP_com with (p:=r)(q:=s). + eapply H. + eapply H2.
